subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham scored his first goal in Italy in A.C. Milan’s 4-1 win over visiting Bologna. Beckham joined A.C. Milan on a three-month loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy. “To score my first goal is great, and I will keep this shirt, but the important thing is we won here today,” Beckham said.
